vars.name: x
vars.description: x[r] = 1 if restaurant r is purchased, 0 otherwise

objective.name: max_total_income
objective.expr: sum(income[r] * x[r] for r in RESTAURANTS)
objective.description: Maximize total annual income from purchased restaurants

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(cost[r] * x[r] for r in RESTAURANTS)
constraints.description: Total cost of purchased restaurants must not exceed the budget

constraints.name: no_A_if_D
constraints.description: If Restaurant D is purchased, Restaurant A cannot be purchased
